description: The cause of the issue is a type confusion flaw present in the V8 JavaScript engine, which is part of the Chromium open-source project. Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) builds prior to 117.0.2045.55 were susceptible to this issue due to their reliance on an outdated version of Chromium that harbored this defect. The upgrade to build 117.0.2045.55 resolves this vulnerability by incorporating the fixes released in corresponding Chromium updates as detailed in KB-117.0.2045.55.
